titles: Here begynneth the pystles and gospels, of euery Sonday, and holy daye in the yere
date: The yere of our lorde. M.D.xxxviij. [1538]
notes: Bound with STC 16004: Here after foloweth the prymer in Englysshe set out alonge, after the vse of the Sarum.
Reproduction of the original in the Pierpont Morgan Library, New York City.
keywords: Church of England. --  Book of common prayer.
Bible --  Liturgical lessons, English --  Early works to 1800.
